overview: What would you pay for a Private Show from a fit and toned hottie? I don’t think that will be an issue with these horny guys as they look lustfully at the honed blokes in front of them. Satisfaction is guaranteed in this club and a happy ending is inevitable! Spit-roasting around the stage pole and oiled up fuckers sandwiching a paying customer is not unusual – especially if it’s a private showing, so these hot guys are treated like VIPs – and what a VIP wants, he gets – hard and bare!
title: Private Show
